author: Mark Jefferies
title: Nicole Scherzinger shows she has sky high talent with special concert on a plane
text:
Celebs Nicole Scherzinger shows she has sky high talent with special concert on a plane The X Factor judge entertained the 150 guests on board the UK airline’s VIP trip to Mardi Gras Share Nicole Scherzinger in the cockpit of the plane Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
British Airways made sure their inaugural flight to New Orleans was Schamazing – by getting Nicole Scherzinger on board. 
The X Factor judge entertained the 150 guests on board the UK airline’s VIP trip to Mardi Gras. 
Nicole, 38, posed in the cockpit at Heathrow before performing a mini concert mid-flight. 
She is expected back on the ITV series later this year after passing the her test with viewers with flying colours in 2016. Nicole before her concert with a difference Like us on Facebook
